00031 #include <stdlib.h>

00033 #include "asterisk/crypto.h"
00034 #include "asterisk/logger.h"
00035 
00036 static struct ast_key *stub_ast_key_get(const char *kname, int ktype)
00037 {
00038    ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "Crypto support not loaded!\n");
00039    return NULL;
00040 }
00041 
00042 #ifdef SKREP
00043 #define build_stub(func_name,...) \
00044 static int stub_ ## func_name(__VA_ARGS__) \
00045 { \
00046         ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "Crypto support not loaded!\n"); \
00047         return -1; \
00048 } \
00049 \
00050 int (*func_name)(__VA_ARGS__) = \
00051         stub_ ## func_name;
00052 #endif
00053 #define build_stub(func_name,...) \
00054 static int stub_##func_name(__VA_ARGS__) \
00055 { \
00056         ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "Crypto support not loaded!\n"); \
00057         return -1; \
00058 } \
00059 \
00060 int (*func_name)(__VA_ARGS__) = \
00061         stub_##func_name;
00062 
00063 struct ast_key *(*ast_key_get)(const char *key, int type) =
00064 stub_ast_key_get;
00065 
00066 build_stub(ast_check_signature, struct ast_key *key, const char *msg, const char *sig);
00067 build_stub(ast_check_signature_bin, struct ast_key *key, const char *msg, int msglen, const unsigned char *sig);
00068 build_stub(ast_sign, struct ast_key *key, char *msg, char *sig);
00069 build_stub(ast_sign_bin, struct ast_key *key, const char *msg, int msglen, unsigned char *sig);

00071 build_stub(ast_decrypt_bin, unsigned char *dst, const unsigned char *src, int srclen, struct ast_key *key);
